description: News about Democratic National Convention, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Democratic National Convention
title_page: Democratic National Convention - The New York Times
maintext:
Rennie Davis, ‘Chicago Seven’ Antiwar Activist, Dies at 80
The trial arising from the “police riot” at the 1968 convention thrust him into the spotlight. He later became an unlikely spokesman for a teenage guru.
